-- getOutsideSpeciaList 사외전문가 리스트 SELECT OSCP_SPLT_ID AS 'outSpclId' /*사외전문가ID*/ ,INST_NM AS 'instNm' /*기관명*/ ,OPS_NM AS 'opsNm' /*부서*/ ,POA_NM AS 'poaNm' /*직위*/ ,SPLT_NM AS 'spltNm' /*사외전문가명*/ ,TLOC_NM AS 'tlocNm' /*소재지*/ ,CCPC_NO AS 'ccpcNo' /*연락처*/ ,EML AS 'eml' /*이메일*/ ,REPN_SPHE AS 'repnSphe' /*대표분야*/ ,HMPG AS 'hmpg' /*홈페이지*/ ,TIMP_CARR AS 'timpCarr' /*주요경력,내용*/ ,(CASE WHEN (select count(1) from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FILE_ID and DEL_YN = 'N') = 0 THEN NULL ELSE A.ATTC_FILE_ID END) AS 'attcFilId' /*정보제공동의서*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_OSCP_SPLT A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND INST_NM like '%${instNm}%'
AND REPN_SPHE like '%${repnSphe}%'
AND SPLT_NM like '%${spltNm}%'
ORDER BY OSCP_SPLT_ID DESC
